verses.verse: Moreover the spirit<WH7307> lifted me up,<WH5375> <WH853> and brought<WH935> me unto<WH413> the east<WH6931> gate<WH8179> of the LORD's<WH3068> house,<WH1004> which looketh<WH6437> eastward:<WH6921> and behold<WH2009> at the door<WH6607> of the gate<WH8179> five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> men;<WH376> among<WH8432> whom I saw<WH7200> <WH853> Jaazaniah<WH2970> the son<WH1121> of Azur,<WH5809> and Pelatiah<WH6410> the son<WH1121> of Benaiah,<WH1141> princes<WH8269> of the people.<WH5971>

Then said<WH559> he unto<WH413> me, Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> these<WH428> are the men<WH376> that devise<WH2803> mischief,<WH205> and give<WH3289> wicked<WH7451> counsel<WH6098> in this<WH2063> city: <WH5892>
Which say,<WH559> It is not<WH3808> near;<WH7138> let us build<WH1129> houses:<WH1004> this<WH1931> city is the caldron,<WH5518> and we<WH587> be the flesh.<WH1320>
Therefore <WH3651> prophesy<WH5012> against<WH5921> them, prophesy,<WH5012> O son<WH1121> of man.<WH120>

And the Spirit<WH7307> of the LORD<WH3068> fell<WH5307> upon<WH5921> me, and said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, Speak;<WH559> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> Thus<WH3651> have ye said,<WH559> O house<WH1004> of Israel:<WH3478> for I<WH589> know<WH3045> the things that come<WH4609> into your mind,<WH7307> every one of them.
Ye have multiplied<WH7235> your slain<WH2491> in this<WH2063> city,<WH5892> and ye have filled<WH4390> the streets<WH2351> thereof with the slain.<WH2491>

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Your slain<WH2491> whom<WH834> ye have laid<WH7760> in the midst<WH8432> of it, they<WH1992> are the flesh,<WH1320> and this<WH1931> city is the caldron:<WH5518> but I will bring you forth<WH3318> <WH853> out of the midst<WH4480> <WH8432> of it.
Ye have feared<WH3372> the sword;<WH2719> and I will bring<WH935> a sword<WH2719> upon<WH5921> you, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
And I will bring<WH3318> you out of the midst<WH4480> <WH8432> thereof, and deliver<WH5414> you into the hands<WH3027> of strangers,<WH2114> and will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> among you.
Ye shall fall<WH5307> by the sword;<WH2719> I will judge<WH8199> you in<WH5921> the border<WH1366> of Israel;<WH3478> and ye shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

This <WH1931> city shall not<WH3808> be<WH1961> your caldron,<WH5518> neither shall ye<WH859> be<WH1961> the flesh<WH1320> in the midst<WH8432> thereof; but I will judge<WH8199> you in<WH413> the border<WH1366> of Israel: <WH3478>

And ye shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD:<WH3068> for<WH834> ye have not<WH3808> walked<WH1980> in my statutes,<WH2706> neither<WH3808> executed<WH6213> my judgments,<WH4941> but have done<WH6213> after the manners<WH4941> of the heathen<WH1471> that<WH834> are round about<WH5439> you.

And it came to pass,<WH1961> when I prophesied,<WH5012> that Pelatiah<WH6410> the son<WH1121> of Benaiah<WH1141> died.<WH4191> Then fell I down<WH5307> upon<WH5921> my face,<WH6440> and cried<WH2199> with a loud<WH1419> voice,<WH6963> and said,<WH559> Ah<WH162> Lord<WH136> GOD!<WH3069> wilt thou<WH859> make<WH6213> a full end<WH3617> <WH853> of the remnant<WH7611> of Israel?<WH3478>
Again the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> thy brethren,<WH251> even thy brethren,<WH251> the men<WH376> of thy kindred,<WH1353> and all<WH3605> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> wholly,<WH3605> are they unto whom<WH834> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> have said,<WH559> Get you far<WH7368> from<WH4480> <WH5921> the LORD:<WH3068> unto us is this<WH1931> land<WH776> given<WH5414> in possession.<WH4181>

Therefore <WH3651> say,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Although<WH3588> I have cast them far off<WH7368> among the heathen,<WH1471> and although<WH3588> I have scattered<WH6327> them among the countries,<WH776> yet will I be<WH1961> to them as a little<WH4592> sanctuary<WH4720> in the countries<WH776> where<WH834> <WH8033> they shall come.<WH935>

Therefore <WH3651> say,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> I will even gather<WH6908> you from<WH4480> the people,<WH5971> and assemble<WH622> you out of<WH4480> the countries<WH776> where<WH834> ye have been scattered,<WH6327> and I will give<WH5414> you<WH853> the land<WH127> of Israel.<WH3478>

And they shall come<WH935> thither,<WH8033> and they shall take away<WH5493> <WH853> all<WH3605> the detestable things<WH8251> thereof and all<WH3605> the abominations<WH8441> thereof from<WH4480> thence.

And I will give<WH5414> them one<WH259> heart,<WH3820> and I will put<WH5414> a new<WH2319> spirit<WH7307> within<WH7130> you; and I will take<WH5493> the stony<WH68> heart<WH3820> out of their flesh,<WH4480> <WH1320> and will give<WH5414> them a heart<WH3820> of flesh: <WH1320>

That <WH4616> they may walk<WH1980> in my statutes,<WH2708> and keep<WH8104> mine ordinances,<WH4941> and do<WH6213> them: <WH853> and they shall be<WH1961> my people,<WH5971> and I<WH589> will be<WH1961> their God.<WH430>

But as for them whose heart<WH3820> walketh<WH1980> after<WH413> the heart<WH3820> of their detestable things<WH8251> and their abominations,<WH8441> I will recompense<WH5414> their way<WH1870> upon their own heads,<WH7218> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

Then did the cherubims<WH3742> lift up<WH5375> <WH853> their wings,<WH3671> and the wheels<WH212> beside<WH5980> them; and the glory<WH3519> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> was over<WH5921> them above.<WH4480> <WH4605>

And the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> went up<WH5927> from<WH4480> <WH5921> the midst<WH8432> of the city,<WH5892> and stood<WH5975> upon<WH5921> the mountain<WH2022> which<WH834> is on the east side<WH4480> <WH6924> of the city.<WH5892>

Afterwards the spirit<WH7307> took me up,<WH5375> and brought<WH935> me in a vision<WH4758> by the Spirit<WH7307> of God<WH430> into Chaldea,<WH3778> to<WH413> them of the captivity.<WH1473> So the vision<WH4758> that<WH834> I had seen<WH7200> went up<WH5927> from<WH4480> <WH5921> me.
Then I spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> them of the captivity<WH1473> <WH853> all<WH3605> the things<WH1697> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had showed<WH7200> me.
